translations: n.外表；虚饰；饰面；胶合板的一层；薄木片

sentences.sentence: He was able to fool the world with his veneer of education.
sentences.translation: 他能够通过对自己的教育背景加以虚饰来愚弄世人。

sentences.sentence: Her veneer of politeness began to crack.
sentences.translation: 她那彬彬有礼的伪装开始露馅儿了。

sentences.sentence: The wood was cut into large sheets of veneer.
sentences.translation: 这些木料被切割成了大块的饰面薄板。
